blocks.name: reps
blocks.content: Construct a function mapping a half-open range of nonnegative integers to a constant. (Contributed by AV, 4-Nov-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm reps(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)), wceq(co(c0, creps, c2), cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)), wceq(co(c0, creps, c2), cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), c0)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), c0), universe))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  simpr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0))
  mp1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), c0), universe), wcel(co(nat0, cfzo, c2), universe))
  ovex(nat0, cfzo, c2)
  mptexg(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), universe, c0)
  ovmpt2ga(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c2, cn0, cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), c0), universe, creps, cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))
  mpteq12dva(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, c2), c0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  adantl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs1)), co(nat0, cfzo, c2)))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), c2, nat0, cfzo)
  simpll(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs1))))
  df-reps(hs0, hs1, s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cfzo, c2)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cfzo.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cn0)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cn0)
  diff.hs1.c(cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), c0))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm reps(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)‚Üí(c0[repeatS]c2)=(s0 ‚àà(0[..^]c2)‚Ü¶ c0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0), (c0[repeatS]c2)=(s0 ‚àà(0[..^]c2)‚Ü¶ c0), c0 ‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, (s0 ‚àà(0[..^]c2)‚Ü¶ c0)‚àà ùïå)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, c1)
  simpr(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  mp1i((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0), (s0 ‚àà(0[..^]c2)‚Ü¶ c0)‚àà ùïå, (0[..^]c2)‚àà ùïå)
  ovex(nat0, cfzo, c2)
  mptexg(s0, (0[..^]c2), universe, c0)
  ovmpt2ga(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c2, cn0, (s0 ‚àà(0[..^]c2)‚Ü¶ c0), universe, creps, (s0 ‚àà(0[..^]hs1)‚Ü¶ hs0))
  mpteq12dva(s0, (0[..^]hs1), hs0, (0[..^]c2), c0, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  adantl(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2, (0[..^]hs1)=(0[..^]c2))
  oveq2(hs1, c2, nat0, cfzo)
  simpll(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2, s0 ‚àà(0[..^]hs1))
  df-reps(hs0, hs1, s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cfzo, c2)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cfzo.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cn0)
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ‚àà(0[..^]c2)‚Ü¶ c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cn0)
  diff.hs1.c((s0 ‚àà(0[..^]c2)‚Ü¶ c0))
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: repsundef
blocks.content: A function mapping a half-open range of nonnegative integers with an upper bound not being a nonnegative integer to a constant is the empty set (in the meaning of "undefined"). (Contributed by AV, 5-Nov-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm repsundef(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wnel(c0, cn0), wceq(co(c1, creps, c0), emptycls))
} = {
  sylancr(wnel(c0, cn0), wceq(co(c1, creps, c0), emptycls), wceq(cdm(creps), cxp(universe, cn0)), wn(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c0, cn0))))
  dmmpt2(hs0, hs1, creps, universe, cn0, cmpt(hs2, co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))
  df-reps(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  mptex(hs2, co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))
  ovex(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs1))
  intnand(wnel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c0, cn0))
  biimpi(wnel(c0, cn0), wn(wcel(c0, cn0)))
  df-nel(c0, cn0)
  ndmovg(creps, universe, cn0, c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cn0)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(cn0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs2.c(co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm repsundef(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àâ ‚Ñï0 ‚Üí(c1[repeatS]c0)= ‚àÖ)
} = {
  sylancr(c0 ‚àâ ‚Ñï0, (c1[repeatS]c0)= ‚àÖ, dom(repeatS)=(ùïå √ó ‚Ñï0), ¬¨(c1 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0))
  dmmpt2(hs0, hs1, creps, universe, cn0, (hs2 ‚àà(0[..^]hs1)‚Ü¶ hs0))
  df-reps(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  mptex(hs2, (0[..^]hs1), hs0)
  ovex(nat0, cfzo, hs1)
  intnand(c0 ‚àâ ‚Ñï0, c1 ‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  biimpi(c0 ‚àâ ‚Ñï0, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  df-nel(c0, cn0)
  ndmovg(creps, universe, cn0, c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cn0)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(cn0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs2.c((0[..^]hs1))
}

blocks.name: repsf
blocks.content: The constructed function mapping a half-open range of nonnegative integers to a constant is a function. (Contributed by AV, 4-Nov-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm repsf(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)), wf(co(c0, creps, c2), co(nat0, cfzo, c2), c1))
} = {
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)), wf(co(c0, creps, c2), co(nat0, cfzo, c2), c1), wf(cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), c0), co(nat0, cfzo, c2), c1))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)), wf(cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), c0), co(nat0, cfzo, c2), c1), wral(hs0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), wcel(c0, c1)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0), wral(hs0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), wcel(c0, c1)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c1))
  simpl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, c2)))
  fmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), c0, c1, cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), c0))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), c0))
  feq1d(co(c0, creps, c2), co(nat0, cfzo, c2), c1, cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), c0), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)))
  reps(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(co(nat0, cfzo, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm repsf(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)‚Üí((c0[repeatS]c2):(0[..^]c2)‚Üí c1))
} = {
  mpbird((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0), ((c0[repeatS]c2):(0[..^]c2)‚Üí c1), ((hs0 ‚àà(0[..^]c2)‚Ü¶ c0):(0[..^]c2)‚Üí c1))
  sylib((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0), ((hs0 ‚àà(0[..^]c2)‚Ü¶ c0):(0[..^]c2)‚Üí c1), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(0[..^]c2), c0 ‚àà c1))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(0[..^]c2), c0 ‚àà c1))
  ralrimiva(hs0, (0[..^]c2), c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà c1)
  simpl(c0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà(0[..^]c2))
  fmpt(hs0, (0[..^]c2), c0, c1, (hs0 ‚àà(0[..^]c2)‚Ü¶ c0))
  eqid((hs0 ‚àà(0[..^]c2)‚Ü¶ c0))
  feq1d((c0[repeatS]c2), (0[..^]c2), c1, (hs0 ‚àà(0[..^]c2)‚Ü¶ c0), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0))
  reps(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà c1)
  diff.hs0.c((0[..^]c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

thm repswsymb(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, c2))), wceq(cfv(co(c0, creps, c2), c3), c0))
} = {
  fvmptd(hs0, co(c0, creps, c2), c3, c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), c0, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, c2))))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, c2)), wceq(co(c0, creps, c2), cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), c0)))
  reps(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  eqidd(c0, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, c2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)))
  simp3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, c2)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(nat0, cfzo, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, c2))))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm repswsymb(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà(0[..^]c2))‚Üí((c0[repeatS]c2)` c3)= c0)
} = {
  fvmptd(hs0, (c0[repeatS]c2), c3, c0, (0[..^]c2), c0, c1, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà(0[..^]c2)))
  3adant3(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, c3 ‚àà(0[..^]c2), (c0[repeatS]c2)=(hs0 ‚àà(0[..^]c2)‚Ü¶ c0))
  reps(hs0, c0, c1, c2)

  simp1(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, c3 ‚àà(0[..^]c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((0[..^]c2))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà(0[..^]c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

thm repsdf2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)), wb(wceq(c3, co(c0, creps, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c3), c2), wral(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  3bitr2d(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)), wceq(c3, co(c0, creps, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c3), c2), wral(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c0))), wceq(c3, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, c2), csn(c0))), wf(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), csn(c0)))
  eqeq2d(c3, co(c0, creps, c2), cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, c2), csn(c0)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)))
  repsconst(c0, c1, c2)
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0), wb(wf(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), csn(c0)), wceq(c3, cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, c2), csn(c0)))))
  fconst2g(c0, c1, c3, co(nat0, cfzo, c2))
  3bitr4g(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)), wf(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), csn(c0)), w3a(wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c3), c2), wral(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c0))), wa(wfn(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, c2)), wral(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c0))), wa(wa(wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c3), c2)), wral(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c0))))
  pm5.32rd(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)), wfn(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, c2)), wral(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c0)), wa(wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c3), c2)))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)), wral(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c0)), wb(wfn(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c3), c2))))
  impbid(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)), wral(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c0))), wfn(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c3), c2)))
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)), wral(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c0)), wi(wfn(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c3), c2))))
  expcomd(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)), wral(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c0)), wfn(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c3), c2)))
  syl5bir(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)), wa(wfn(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, c2)), wral(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c0))), wa(wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c3), c2)), wf(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), csn(c0)))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)), wf(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), csn(c0)), wa(wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c3), c2)))
  jca(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)), wf(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), csn(c0))), wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c3), c2))
  3syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)), wf(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), csn(c0))), wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wa(wf(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), csn(c0)), wss(csn(c0), c1)), wf(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), c1))
  anim1ci(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)), wf(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), csn(c0)), wss(csn(c0), c1))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0), wss(csn(c0), c1))
  snssi(c0, c1)
  fss(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), csn(c0), c1)
  iswrdi(c3, c2, c1)
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)), wf(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), csn(c0)), wceq(cfv(chash, c3), c2))
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0), wi(wf(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), csn(c0)), wceq(cfv(chash, c3), c2)))
  syl11(wcel(c2, cn0), wf(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, c2), csn(c0)), wceq(cfv(chash, c3), c2), wfn(c3, co(nat0, cfzo, c2)))
